de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.dimensionsimilarity

Interface DimensionSimilarity<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CovarianceDimensionSimilarity, HiCSDimensionSimilarity, HSMDimensionSimilarity, MCEDimensionSimilarity, SlopeDimensionSimilarity, SlopeInversionDimensionSimilarity, SURFINGDimensionSimilarity

    public interface DimensionSimilarity<V>
    Interface for computing pairwise dimension similarities, used for arranging dimensions in parallel coordinate plots.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void computeDimensionSimilarites(Relation<? extends V> relation, DBIDs subset, DimensionSimilarityMatrix matrix)
      Compute the dimension similarity matrix

    • Method Detail

      • computeDimensionSimilarites

        void computeDimensionSimilarites(Relation<? extends V> relation,
                                 DBIDs subset,
                                 DimensionSimilarityMatrix matrix)
        Compute the dimension similarity matrix
        Parameters:
        relation - Relation
        subset - DBID subset (for sampling / selection)
        matrix - Matrix to fill
